title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if considers f'(t)=0

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for justification

f'(t) = 0 when t = 0.66187 and t = 2.84038

The minimum of f for 0 ≤ t ≤ 5 may occur at 0, 0.66187, 2.84038, or 5.

f(0) = -2

f(0.66187) = -1.39760

f(2.84038) = -2.26963

f(5) = -0.48027

The distance between the road and the edge of the water was decreasing most rapidly at time t = 2.840 hours after the storm began.
